text: È kaani ga toɠa ga wooɠɛɠila nu è ʋɛ, è minazeɠegi ɓɛtɛ wo yɔɠɔzu wa tɔ, è minazeɠeni ga ɗa Kanaan nuiti, ta Ɠɛte nuiti, ta Amool nuiti, naa ʋɛɛ Felɛze, ta Yeɓuse, ta Giilegase nuiti ta-yooi veezu Abalaame naa ʋɛ, mavofodaiti ti ʋa zei ná. È ɗa-minazeɠegi laazeelini bɛ, mazɔlɔɔ è lelebogɛ.
